markup.description: Inline Edit allows a user to do quick edits to simple text without having to switch modes or screens. All work is done on the same interface which helps the user maintain context.
markup.instructions:
• Activate the Edit button.
  • Edit the text and click the Save button.
  • Try the Undo/Redo button.

Note that this demo shows three Rich Text Inline Edits, to illustrate how the component works with multiple rich text editors.
